Join RennerBrown and Cherwell for

No-Code ITSM During a Crisis

In a world where priorities are shifting daily it is more important than ever to have a system that can rapidly evolve with your business. A solution that can drive Digital Transformation efforts while improving your ITSM maturity.

Discover how organizations are:
  • Reducing implementation time and cost by up to 50%
  • Speeding up delivery and time to market
  • Reducing the need for skilled developers
  • Delivering Services efficiently, automating processes and providing modern day service experiences

    When and Where

  • October 8, 2020
  • 10:00 AM (EST)
  • Online
Low Code Development

Cherwell CORE provides a no-code development and delivery platform, enabling you to create and modify metadata configuration files via visual editors without requiring coding or programming expertise.

Integration Services

Cherwell CORE provides a comprehensive set of RESTful API commands for extending capabilities and integrations.

Workflow Automation

Automating workflows is the heart of the Cherwell CORE. Cherwell provides process workflows and supporting capabilities for ITSM, HR, Facilities, PPM, Security and other solutions that run on the common platform.

Agenda

  • Introduction
  • ITSM Platform Presentation
  • Customer Success Story
  • CTA and Q & A session

  • All attendees will receive a free Business Value Assessment

  • Quantitative analysis on process and product improvement

  • Value driven outcomes

  • Process improvement discovery session

Speakers

  • Mark Robinson
    Mark Robinson has 20+ years as a technologist, with specialties in Systems, Asset and Service Management. Currently a Sr. Solution Engineer helping Cherwell customers and prospects realize the most value from CSM.
  • Jamie Cannon
    Jamie Cannon has 15+ years as a Solutions Architect, with specialties in Service and Asset Management. Currently the Director of Professional Services at RennerBrown, Jamie and his team are committed to helping customers and prospects get the most value from their ITSM solutions.
  • Bob Turek
    Bob Turek is Co-founder and President of RennerBrown Inc. He is an industry veteran of the IT Consulting world with over 25 years of IT Staffing & Software Sales experience. Bob is passionate about the synergies between People, Process, Technology and Data. His purpose is to help educate customers and candidates on finding their place in the ever-evolving world of technology and automation.
  • Chris Chagnon
    Chris Chagnon is an ITSM Architect and web developer who designs, develops, and maintains award-winning experiences for managing and carrying out the ITSM process. Chris has a Master of Science in Information Technology, and a bachelor’s degree in Visual Communications. In addition, Chris is a PhD Candidate studying Information Systems with a focus on user and service experience. As one of HDI’s Top 25 Thought Leaders, Chris speaks nationally about the future of ITSM, practical applications of artificial intelligence and machine learning, gamification, continual service improvement, and customer service/experience.
